amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning legislation requiring reports of serious adverse events related to dietary supplements and over-the-counter drugs.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3462 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3462 proposed by Senator Harkin to Amendment SA 3225. (consideration: CR S7077-7083, S7086; text: CR S7077) To express the sense of the Senate concerning legislation requiring reports of serious adverse events related to dietary supplements and over-the-counter drugs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3462 proposed by Senator Harkin to Amendment SA 3225.
